MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH15 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Bath Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.44pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Rosefield Avenue substation to investigate a blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.04pm on Monday 1st March 2021.
